tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Reetadyuti Mukhopadhyay is Gem, Experienced, ************* *** ****** ******* Recently I got my son ACL surgery done through him. I am highly satisfied with his treatment. In addition to excellent Orthopedic Surgeon he is very good human, his friendliness approach, care for each and every patient makes patient very comfortable.

Thanks you very much Doctor!!!

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The doctor wrote the exercises and dis not explain. Rather asked me to visit the physio person on other floor to understand the exercises. The physio person told me explaining exercises is chargeable and one more consultation fee needs to be paid in the same visit. Horrible . If the treatment is only exercise, y would you not explain the exercise. What have i paid the consultation for?? Never visit ck birla. **** *** ******* *** ***** * ****** ****
reply_text:
Dear Ms Kanika, after having taken a detailed history and performing a thorough examination that lasted close to 15 minutes I had been advised you a few sessions of electro therapy along with exercises and medicines. Orthopaedic treatment not only involves medicines and exercises but also therapy in the form of ultrasonics/IFT/SWD which are given by an expert physiotherapist. 

Having gauged your problem, it would not have been wise to start the exercises right away without controlling the pain first. That is the reason you were advised to visit the physiotherapist to take a session and learn and perform the exercises under direct observation. 

A guided rehabilitation would decrease the chances of you doing them wrong and worsening the condition. 

You were also advised that once you have learnt the exercises correctly you need not come back to the hospital every day but do the exercises at home correctly.

I would also like to bring to your notice that all services are charged seperately. You may have very well visited any physiotherapist of your choice if the fees were an issue.

review: I was treated by Dr. Reetadyuti for a bankart and hill sach lesion in my left shoulder.
